item.title: Help! Microsoft Outlook Spammer!
item.dc:creator: @RdSoxFan618 RdSoxFan618
item.description:
@RdSoxFan618 wrote:

[code]///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//Microsoft Outlook Spammer
//Since I’m such a hugeeeeeeeeee nooby, just make sure the actual e-mail you are sending is maximized.
//This is my first script using Constants.
//There’s a first time for everything
//Put the crosshair on the Outlook Express Screen onto the inbox with all your messages.
//Setup Lines 15-16
//Enjoy!
//Thanks to Jho for inspiration for this script.
///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

program MicrosoftOutlookExpress;

const
Email = ‘The E-mail Address’;//The E-mail address you would like to spam >:D
Subject = ‘Please read this!’;//The Subject of the Message
Message1 = ‘Spam! Spam! Spam! Spam! Spammity Spam!’;//The Message You want to send.

Procedure EntireThing;
begin
MoveMouseSmooth(-155,-63);
ClickMouse(-155,-63,true);
MoveMouseSmooth(20,17);
ClickMouse(20,17,true);
SendKeys(Email);
MoveMouseSmooth(24,20);
ClickMouse(24,20,true);
SendKeys(Email);
MoveMouseSmooth(27,17);
ClickMouse(27,17,true);
SendKeys(Message1);
MoveMouseSmooth(30,17);
ClickMouse(30,17,true);
end;

begin
Repeat
EntireThing;
Until(False)
end.[/code]

Can somebody tell me why this is not working? I have it so that it goes to -155,-63 (The Create New [E-mail] Button) but it doesn’t go over there.

What’s wrong!

Read full topic
